MatchCfg:
<@TABLEAU> <@META> <MatchMode @TYPE="repeated" MissionType="enum<.MissionType>" desc="string">
<Strategy StrategyID="enum<.ENMMatchStrategy>" desc="string" />
<Scope ScopeID="enum<.ENMMatchScope>" desc="string" /> <Filter @TYPE="repeated" FilterID="enum<.ENMMatchFilter>" Open="bool" Value="int32" UpdInterval="duration" desc="string">
<AI Type="enum<.ENMAIWarmType>" IsOpen="bool" MinTime="duration" MaxTime="duration" desc="string" />
<Random @TYPE="repeated" MissionType="enum<.MissionType>" Priority="int32" />
</@META> </@TABLEAU>
